mapper.insert: insert into post(title, contents, cate_mid_id, user_id, price, deal_type, deal_weak) values(#{title},#{contents},#{cate_mid_id},#{user_id},#{price},#{deal_type},#{deal_weak})
mapper.select:
select t0.* ,t1.files ,t2.tags from post t0
left outer join ( select post_id, max(img_url) as files from post_img group by post_id ) t1 on t0.post_id = t1.post_id
left outer join (
SELECT post_id, group_concat(tag) AS tags FROM hashtag GROUP BY post_id ) t2 on t0.post_id = t2.post_id
left outer join `like` t3 on t0.post_id = t3.post_id
where del_flag != 1
and (t0.post_id in ( select post_id from hashtag where tag like CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') group by post_id ) or t0.title like CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') )
and t3.user_id = #{user_id}
and t0.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT p.* , (SELECT group_concat(tag) FROM hashtag WHERE post_id=#{post_id}) AS 'tags' , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(img_url) FROM post_img WHERE post_id=#{post_id}) AS 'files' , c.name AS 'cate_mid_name' , b.name AS 'cate_big_name' , b.cate_big_id AS 'cate_big_id' FROM post p, category_mid c, category_big b WHERE p.cate_mid_id = c.cate_mid_id and b.cate_big_id = c.cate_big_id and p.post_id = #{post_id}
